name: Talented Totes- 2AM
description:
The ever-saucy "Joy of Ex" Collection for Talented Totes is the brainchild of writer Sally Beerworth. Her playful tote collection makes an amazing giftâ€¦ but you might just have to grab one for yourself too!

-Natural Canvas
-wipe clean

name: Talented Totes- Prince George
description:
Eco-friendly and fabulous, Talented Totes comes to us from across the pond. This tote is perfect for any fan of the Royals! 

-Natural Canvas
-wipe clean
-comes with an "I Love George" button

name: Mimi & Marge Anchor Studs
description:
Made of 100% reclaimed sterling silver in Bali, by Mimi & Marge. 

Tax and shipping not included. 
Earrings are final sale.

name: High-Rise Skinny Gem Yoga Jeans
description:
Yoga Jeans have a 4-way stretch that will mold to your body and become like a second skin. We recommend going down 1-2 sizes from your standard denim (especially for high-rise). They should feel more snug than you'd like for the first couple of wears... but don't worry, they'll soon relax to fit your unique curves. Your first pair of Yoga Jeans? Feel free to contact us so we can help you select the best style and size. 

Gem-hued zircon wash.

Approximate Sizing (Please see sizing chart for waist sizes):
Rise: 10"
Leg opening: 6.5"
In-Seam: 34"

Made in Montreal
98% cotton
2% elastane
Machine wash cold, hang to dry

Can't find the style/size/wash that you want? E-mail us and let us know what you're looking for as we may have it in-store. 

Price does not include tax or shipping.

name: Mimi & Marge Stach Necklace 111P416
description:
It may not be movember, but you can always make a statement with this stache pendant. Made of 100% reclaimed sterling silver in Bali, by Mimi & Marge. 

Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Single Bird Necklace 165P366
description:
Mimi & Marge is a Vancouver jewellery line that makes classic pieces with a fun twist. This cute sterling silver bird pendant sits on a fine silver chain. 

Taxes and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Guns a Blazing Necklace #156P419
description:
Mimi & Marge is a Vancouver based accessory line who works primarily in reclaimed silver and rose gold. Their "Guns a Blazing" necklace features a small pistol pendant strung onto a fine chain. Both sterling silver. 


Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Tiny Citra Key Necklace 92P115
description:
Mimi & Marge is a Vancouver based jewellery line that employs local craftsmen at their Bali studio, making hand-worked pieces out of precious metals. This 1" long sterling silver key is strung onto an 18" fine silver chain. 

Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Triangle Bracelet 15B442
description:
Mimi & Marge is a Vancouver based accessory line, working mostly in reclaimed silver and rose gold. Wear their delicate silver triangle bracelet on its own, or layer it up with other accessories! 

Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Cross Bracelet 162B444
description:
Mimi & Marge is an accessory line out of Vancouver B.C. who work mostly with reclaimed silver and rose gold. Wear their delicate silver cross bracelet on its own, or layer it up with other accessories! 

Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Rope Stud Earrings 197 E331
description:
Vancouver-based Mimi & Marge makes classic styles of jewellery out of their Bali studio. These elegant silver rope studs are the perfect pair of everyday earrings! 

Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge XO Earrings 41E 350
description:
Fall in love with these XO studs from Vancouver jewellery line Mimi & Marge. Made of Sterling Silver. Approximately 0.25"x0.25".

Earrings are final sale. 
Tax and shipping not included.

name: Mimi & Marge Rose Gold Heart Studs 25E211R
description:
There's nothing more romantic than these little rose gold heart studs from Vancouver based jewellery line Mimi & Marge! They are hand-made at the Bali studio where local craftsman create Mimi & Marge's classic collections. 

Tax and shipping not included. 
Earrings are final sale.

name: Mimi & Marge Rose Gold Pearl Studs 30TE803R
description:
These classic rose gold pearl earrings are by Vancouver based Mimi and Marge. Approx. 0.25" in diameter. 

Earrings are final sale.
Shipping and tax not included.

name: Alkemie Peace Dove Hoops E31
description:
Alkemie is a design collaboration between husband and wife duo Ashley Lowengrub and Dara Gerson. It is a socially & environmentally conscious jewellery line made of 100% reclaimed metals in downtown L.A.

A dove, representing love and peace, flies spread-winged on each hoop. They are made of 100% reclaimed metals with a gold patina. 
  
Earrings are final sale.
Shipping and tax not included.

name: Alkemie Two Leaf Spider Earrings E20
description:
Alkemie is a design collaboration between husband and wife duo Ashley Lowengrub and Dara Gerson. It is a socially & environmentally conscious jewellery line made of 100% reclaimed metals in downtown L.A.

Two leaves hang down from each gold hook. A spider, symbolizing power and growth, crawls down the front of one of the earrings. Made of 100% reclaimed metal with a gold overlay.

Earrings are final sale.
Shipping and tax not included. 
Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Alkemie Crescent Moon Necklace C25
description:
Alkemie is a design collaboration between husband and wife duo Ashley Lowengrub and Dara Gerson. It is a socially & environmentally conscious jewellery line made of 100% reclaimed metals in downtown L.A.

The crescent moon is a symbol of potential. It is 100% reclaimed metal with a gold patina. 21" long.

Shipping and tax not included. 
Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Alkemie Eagle Claw and Sword Necklace C174
description:
Alkemie is a design collaboration between husband and wife duo Ashley Lowengrub and Dara Gerson. It is a socially & environmentally conscious jewellery line made of 100% reclaimed metals in downtown L.A.

This ornate pendant will add some warrior energy into your life. It's made of 100% reclaimed metal with a gold patina. 19" long.

Shipping and tax not included. 
Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Alkemie African Link, Claw and Bird Necklace C130
description:
Alkemie is a design collaboration between husband and wife duo Ashley Lowengrub and Dara Gerson. It is a socially & environmentally conscious jewellery line made of 100% reclaimed metals in downtown L.A.

This edgy necklace has Alkemie's signature linked chain (27") with a claw pendant. About 2" up hangs a tiny bird. Made of 100% reclaimed metals with a gold overlay. 
  
Shipping and tax not included. 
Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Second Denim Yoga Jean - High Rise Skinny in Ink SWP1130
description:
Yoga Jeans have a 4-way stretch that will mold to your body and become like a second skin. We recommend going down 1-2 sizes from your standard denim (especially for high-rise). They should feel more snug than you'd like for the first couple of wears... but don't worry, they'll soon relax to fit your unique curves. Your first pair of Yoga Jeans? Feel free to contact us so we can help you select the best style and size. 

Approximate Sizing (Please see sizing chart for waist sizes):

Leg opening: 6.5"
In-Seam: 34"

98% cotton
2% elastane
Machine wash cold, hang to dry

name: Silver Seasons Blackcurrant Earrings by Michael Michaud 4915BZBL
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora, from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the individual botanical and designer accompanies each piece. 

These contemporary earrings are made of lava bead blackcurrants, and hand patinaed bronze stems. They reach about 2.5" long with sterling silver posts.    

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada. 
All earrings are final sale.

name: Silver Seasons Blackcurrant Necklace by Michael Michaud 8312BZBL
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora, from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the individual botanical and designer, accompanies each piece. 

This contemporary pendant is made of lava bead blackcurrants, and hand patinaed bronze leaves. The pendant is 2" long, and sits on an 8.5" adjustable bronze snake chain. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada. 
All earrings are final sale.

name: Silver Seasons Blackcurrant Studs by Michael Michaud 4912BZBL
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora, from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the individual botanical and designer accompanies each piece. 

These contemporary earrings are made of lava bead blackcurrants, and hand patinaed bronze leaves. They have sterling silver posts. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada. 
All earrings are final sale.

name: Silver Seasons Bleeding Heart Necklace by Michael Michaud 8137BZPP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the designer, and individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

These delicate looking bleeding hearts have a bronze base, with a subtle copper finish that peeks out from under a hand patinaed silver top coat. In the centre of the smaller heart sits a tiny, pink fresh water pearl. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Blueberry Necklace Michael Michaud 7925BZBC
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the designer, and individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

A hand patinaed bronze vine leads down to a cluster of blue coral blueberries and delicate leaves on this Silver Seasons necklace. 


Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Bittersweet Earrings by Michael Michaud 4906BZCN
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

These stud earrings have a central red fruit, made of Carnelian, which is a semi-precious stone thought to bring energy to the wearer. Opt for leaves in a golden hand patinaed bronze ($64), or peach fresh water pearls (studs $85, Silver hook $90). 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Bittersweet Necklace by Michael Michaud 8309BZCN
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the designer, and individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

On this long stranded necklace sits two rows of Bittersweet berries. The little red fruits are made of Carnelian, a semi-precious stone thought to bring energy to the wearer. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Bittersweet Pendant by Michael Michaud 8308BZCN
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

On this snake chain sits a small Bittersweet pendant. The little red fruit is made of Carnelian, a semi-precious stone thought to bring energy to the wearer. Surrounding it are 3 peach fresh water pearl leaves.

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Bittersweet Cascading Necklace by Michael Michaud 8305BZCN
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the designer, and individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

A hand patinaed bronze branch with cascading Bittersweet vines and fruit sits on a large linked chain. The little red fruits are made of Carnelian, a semi-precious stone thought to bring energy to the wearer. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Cherry Blossom Studs by Michael Michaud 4887BZWP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

Cherry Blossoms are an enduring metaphor for the ephemeral nature of life. The Flowers are made of Keshi pearls with an oxidized bronze branch and chain. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Clover Collection by Michael Michaud
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece.

Even without a 4th leaf, these clovers are sure to bring you good luck! Each piece is made of hand patinaed bronze. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap.

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons French Lavender Earrings by Michael Michaud 4885BZLP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

French Lavender is materialized in these dainty earrings. The lavender freshwater pearl flowers pop out against the 3 hand patinaed bronze leaves. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons French Lavender Hook Earrings Michael Michaud 4886BZLP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

These French Lavender earrings are made of 10 lavender pearl flowers that sit on hand patinaed bronze stems. Sterling silver hook. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons French Lavender Necklace by Michael Michaud 8277BZLP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

This French Lavender pendant hangs off of a fine adjustable bronze chain. There are 10 flowers, made of lavender pearls, that sit on hand patinaed bronze stems. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons French Lavender Pearl Necklace by Michael Michaud 8278BZLP
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card, with tidbits about the designer and individual botanical, accompanies each piece. 

Definitely a showstopper, this French Lavender pendant hangs off of a strand of tiny freshwater pearls. The flowers are made of lavender pearls and sit against 3 hand patinaed bronze leaves. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Gingko Charm Necklace by Michael Michaud 8319BZ
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the designer, and individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

The Gingko family dates back to the time of the dinosaurs, and has long been used for its medicinal properties. This long, adjustable bronze chain has various sized gingko leaf charms hanging from it. The delicate details of each leaf are the result of molding directly from the Gingko plant.  

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.

name: Silver Seasons Ginkgo Stud Earrings by Michael Michaud 4210BZ
description:
Silver Seasons is handmade in New York by artist Michael Michaud. He travels the world collecting flora from which he casts his captivating jewelry. A card with tidbits about the individual botanical accompanies each piece. 

The Gingko family dates back to the time of the dinosaurs, and has long been used for its medicinal properties. Single leaf stud earrings are made of hand patinaed bronze. 

Wash with warm water and gentle soap. 

Please note, we currently only ship across Canada.
